title: How to Improve Half Life 2 Deathmatch Skill

steps.headline: Find a good server, a server with a low ping is a must for getting better.
Play with experienced players.
steps.description: Players that are part of a clan are often good. Playing with people that are better than you will help because you will pick up their tricks.

steps.headline: Learn the more advanced techniques such as Grenade Cooking and Bunny Hopping
These tricks can be learned easily with a bit of practice, ask a more experienced player to help you out.
Use the Gravity Gun, if you can throw the prop then you can catch it with right-click.

Spectate the good players by typing "spectate"(without the quotes) in the console (to enable the console go options>keyboard>advanced then click enable developer console), then when you have seen how they do the trick, try it out yourself (join team 0 in the console to resume game)
Run to get any other weapon than what you spawn with.
steps.description: The SMG isn't the greatest gun to use so its best you find any other weapon (aside from pistol).

steps.headline: Know where the keys on your keyboard are.
steps.description: Customize your key layout, change the key bindings in the keyboard tab in the options menu.

steps.headline: Sinks, bricks, chairs and other small and heavy/hard objects are great objects to throw at enemies.

text: Find a good server, a server with a low ping is a must for getting better.  Play with experienced players. Players that are part of a clan are often good. Playing with people that are better than you will help because you will pick up their tricks. Learn the more advanced techniques such as Grenade Cooking and Bunny Hopping  These tricks can be learned easily with a bit of practice, ask a more experienced player to help you out.  Use the Gravity Gun, if you can throw the prop then you can catch it with right-click.  Spectate the good players by typing "spectate"(without the quotes) in the console (to enable the console go options>keyboard>advanced then click enable developer console), then when you have seen how they do the trick, try it out yourself (join team 0 in the console to resume game)  Learn to dodge effectively.  Run to get any other weapon than what you spawn with. The SMG isn't the greatest gun to use so its best you find any other weapon (aside from pistol). Know where the keys on your keyboard are. Customize your key layout, change the key bindings in the keyboard tab in the options menu. Sinks, bricks, chairs and other small and heavy/hard objects are great objects to throw at enemies.
